name: Simple Rube Goldberg Machine with Some Dominos
name_original: Simple Rube Goldberg Machine with Some Dominos
description:
This is a simple Rube Goldberg Machine with some objects interacting with each other. 

I built it with different basic geometric objects like cubes, spheres, and planes. In this demo, a cube pushes a yellow ball to trigger series of dominos, one of whose branch releases a box of balls, and the other branch keeps on pushing down larger and larger dominos.

I found that objects that are not physically connected (i.e., having any joint parts) can still be considered as a rigid body, which motivates me to design a "sliding door" for the box. Another interesting fact is that large objects can have a really low mass such that a domino can push another domino that is way larger than itself.
